snippet: Kizza Besigye, who is running for president, has been placed under house arrest to prevent him from holding rallies that have been called illegal.
abstract: Ugandan opposition leader and presidential candidate Kizza Besigye is placed under house arrest to prevent him from holding public rallies that government says are illegal.
lead_paragraph: Kizza Besigye, who is running for president, has been placed under house arrest to prevent him from holding rallies that have been called illegal.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Uganda: Opposition Leader Is Detained
